mdRecord.dcterms:description: The house was built in 1804 by Samuel McIntire in a Federal style for John and Sarah (West) Gardner. ... The house was sold, in 1814, to Capt. Joseph White. David Pingree bought the house in 1834. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gardner-Pingree_House [work]
